customize-ui-kit/index.title: Customize UI Kit
customize-ui-kit/index.description: This guide helps you to enable/disable features present in the UI Kit.

integration-with-next-js/index.title: Integration with Next.js
integration-with-next-js/index.description: Using React UI Kit, you can integrate your Next.js application with CometChat.

overview/index.title: Overview
overview/index.description: Our React Chat UI Kit lets developers easily add text, voice & video to your website. It a fully polished UI and the complete business logic.

ui-components/index.title: UI Components
